dcterms:creator: B. Libberton
M. Horsburgh
M. Brockhurst
dcterms:description: This dataset includes the Staphylococcus aureus strain SH1000, which is a major human pathogen, used to study the dynamics of toxin-mediated microbial invasions and resistance evolution.
dcterms:title: Staphylococcus aureus (SH1000)

dcterms:creator: B. Libberton
R. Coates
M. Brockhurst
M. Horsburgh
dcterms:description: This dataset includes the Staphylococcus epidermidis strains B180 and B155, which were used to explore their interactions with Staphylococcus aureus and their role in shaping the distribution of S. aureus.
dcterms:title: Staphylococcus epidermidis (B180)

dcterms:creator: B. Libberton
R. Coates
M. Brockhurst
M. Horsburgh
dcterms:description: This dataset includes the Staphylococcus epidermidis strain TU3298, which was analyzed for its whole-genome sequence and its interactions with other Staphylococcus strains.
dcterms:title: Staphylococcus epidermidis (TU3298)
